name: chryso-form-v2
description: Modern form digitization application with Vite React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build -w apps/client
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/server && npm run test -w apps/client
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage -w apps/server && npm run test:coverage -w apps/client
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: eslint . && npm run lint -w apps/server && npm run lint -w apps/client
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --fix && npm run lint:fix -w apps/server && npm run lint:fix -w apps/client
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w apps/server && npm run type-check -w apps/client
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w apps/server && npm run clean -w apps/client
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run test:all

author: SketchClarkey
